field.label: Enabled
field.help: Enable the override for this host

field.label: Host
field.help: Name of the host, without the domain part. Use "*" to create a wildcard entry.

field.label: Domain
field.help: Domain of the host, e.g. example.com

field.label: Type
field.help: Type of resource record, e.g. A or AAAA for IPv4 or IPv6 addresses

field.label: MX Host
field.help: Host name of MX host, e.g. mail.example.com

field.label: IP address
field.help: IP address of the host, e.g. 192.168.100.100 or fd00:abcd::1

field.label: Description
field.help: You may enter a description here for your reference (not parsed)
